text: Pagoda Tree or Chinese Scholar Tree (Styphnolobium) is a genus of flowering plants in the Fabaceae family. After the segregation of Sophora, this genus comprises 9 species.Sousa S M.. and VE. Rudd Revision del Genero Styphnolobium (Leguminosae: Papilionoideae: Sophoreae) Annals of the Missouri Botanical Garden, Vol. 80, No. 1 (1993), pp. 270-28 == References == ==Other websites== *, * http://www.about-garden.com/a/en/3806-sophora-japonica-pendula-japanese- pagoda-tree/ Category:Faboideae
title: Styphnolobium japonicum
